description:
This toolkit helps you bring the power of .NET to your existing VB6 applications, by allowing 
      them to display .NET Forms and Controls from within the same application. Instead of upgrading 
      the entire code base, these applications can now be extended one form at a time. The goal is a 
      phased upgrade, with production releases at the end of each iteration containing both VB6 and 
      VB.NET forms running in the same VB6 .exe process.
summary: Allows developers to incorporate VB.NET WinForms into their VB6 applications.
author: Microsoft
